long_desc.thetext:
I have added orientation support to qx.ui.toolbar. See the diff located at the listed URL. You may want to update the visuals a bit; e.g., the separators are still vertical when the toolbar is oriented vertically; perhaps it should be horizontal. (You can try the updated test in demobrowser to see what vertical toolbars look like.)
This diff is against the current trunk.
Created attachment 486 Patch against trunk (r18792)

Thank you for the patch.
The patch looks good just a few little notes:
1. When changing the orientation in the apply method, the old layout manager should be disposed.
2. The boolean parameter "vertical" would be better named "isVertical". Even more consistent would be a string parameter called "orientation" with "horizontal" as default value.
3. API doc for the "vertical" parameter is missing
4. For vertical toolbars the state "vertical" should be set on each item in the toolbar. This way it is possible to style separators and buttons differently using the appearance system.
Christian can you work with Dave to sort out these minor issues and apply the patch?
Good points; I will make these changes and send a new patch against the current trunk.
(In reply to comment #3) > Christian can you work with Dave to sort out these minor issues and apply the > patch? > Yes, I will have a look.
Accepted.

Created attachment 607 Patch against trunk (rev. 20190)
The implementation is not finished, there are two know issues: - only the modern theme supports the vertical toolbar, the classic theme not - using the vertical parameter on the toolbar constructor has no effect on the children
Created attachment 608 mylyn/context/zip
Created attachment 609 icon for patch against trunk (rev. 20190)
Created attachment 610 icon for patch against trunk (rev. 20190)
Created attachment 611 icon for patch against trunk (rev. 20190)
Created attachment 612 icon for patch against trunk (rev. 20190)

Dave, I added a patch with the proposed improvements from Fabian. But the patch has two issues (see comment #7). Is it possible for you to have a look at it? Otherwise I will do this, but it could takes a while.
Yes, I'll take a look. I know QooxDoo better now than when I first submitted this, so I should be able to clean it up.
mass renaming of 0.9 target to 1.0 (for issues with status "NEW")
Moved to 1.1, because this feauture changes the public API.
Is there any chance this could be implemented soon given that there are patches available? It would be a really useful feature for us.

(In reply to comment #18) > Is there any chance this could be implemented soon given that there are patches > available? It would be a really useful feature for us.
We don't have any plan to fix that issue. And I don't think that these patches are still valid considering the recent changes we had in the UI toolkit.
Move open issues to RESOLVED â€“ LATER, whose last comment is older than a year.
